allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add baseline evaluation infrastructure for model comparison

Created comprehensive baseline evaluation system with:
- evaluate_untrained.py: Evaluate base Qwen2.5-3B (no training)
- train_standard_dpo.py: Train standard TRL DPO (Option A)
- evaluate_model.py: General evaluation script for any model
- compare_baselines.py: Multi-model comparison with plots
- README.md: Complete documentation

Evaluation metrics:
- HH-RLHF: helpful/harmless response quality
- TruthfulQA: honesty/factual accuracy
- Comparison plots for all baselines

Baselines for comparison:
1. Untrained Qwen2.5-3B (pre-alignment)
2. Standard DPO trained on our data (fair comparison)
3. Qwen2.5-3B-Instruct (production reference)
4. AT-PRMD (to be added after training)

[OK] Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
